document_data.caption: [[Elminster Aumar]], ''polymorphed'' into the likeness of Iymbryl Alastrarra
document_data.name: Iymbryl Alastrarra
document_data.nicknames: Mage of Many Gems{{cite book/Elminster in Myth Drannor|45-56}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Iymbryl Alastrarra''' was an [[elf]] [[wizard]] of [[Alastrarra|House Alastrarra]] in [[Cormanthyr]].
document_data.History: Iymbryl was killed on patrol in [[241 DR]] by [[hobgoblins]], but before he died he succeeded in entrusting his house's ''[[tel'kiira]]'' to [[Elminster Aumar]].
